evidence.text: Petitioners-Plaintiffs (“Petitioners”) seek to certify the following class under Federal Rules of Civil Procedure 23(a) and 23(b)(2): All noncitizens in custody in the District of Colorado who were, are, or will be subject to the March 2025 Presidential Proclamation entitled ‘Invocation of the Alien Enemies Act Regarding the Invasion of the United States by Tren De Aragua’ and/or its implementation.
